Class SingleCoreSchedulingAlgorithm

java.lang.Object
schedulingAlgorithm.PriorityDrivenSchedulingAlgorithm
schedulingAlgorithm.SingleCoreSchedulingAlgorithm
Direct Known Subclasses:
DMS, EDF, FCFS, LST, OPA, RMS, SMC
public abstract class SingleCoreSchedulingAlgorithm extends PriorityDrivenSchedulingAlgorithm
Represents an abstract scheduling algorithm designed for single-core systems.
Author:
ShiuJia

This class extends the PriorityDrivenSchedulingAlgorithm and sets the scheduling type to Definition.SchedulingType.SingleCore. It serves as the base class for implementing priority-driven scheduling algorithms that operate in single-core environments.
